attributes.action: Stop exercise in this covid-19 lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Because the minority of people breaking goverment guidelines could be spreading this virus.
attributes.background: Stricter lockdown measures because minority of people are still going to beach and parks.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has lifted some lockdown measures, including allowing people to go to beaches and parks.

If you would like the restrictions to be extended or reinstated, you may wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319329

We can only publish petitions when a full name is included.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
